glossaries.title: AI dente
glossaries.definition: Food that is cooked until it is "firm to the bite"

glossaries.title: Baste
glossaries.definition: To spoon juice over food that is being roasted or baked to prevent it from drying out and to glaze the surface

glossaries.title: Capers
glossaries.definition: Small green flower buds of Mediterranean plant which are preserved in salt or vinegar and used to give a sharp burst of flavor in dishes

glossaries.title: Deglaze
glossaries.definition: To add wine, stock or other liquid to the sediment and cooking juices left in a pan after roasting or sauteing - which is then heated to make a jus.

glossaries.title: Filo Pastry
glossaries.definition: Paper thin sheets of pastry commonly used in Geek, Eastern European Middle Eastern cuisines.
